channel.title: Need Sparring Partners
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need Sparring Partners"

item.title: Re: Need Sparring Partners
item.content:encoded: All added back, and I didn't know that with 5 days… Damn then I need to do it all from the beginning when I come back >.<

item.title: Re: Need Sparring Partners
item.content:encoded:
As a note if your inactive for 5 days or so you stop counting as a sparring partner and it's 10 wasted stamina.

However I need a few more to reach my goal in time still so:
Kedoch added all of the above (Shadow, Kakashi and Tobi HMF)

item.title: Re: Need Sparring Partners
item.content:encoded: Not quitting the game… Just going on summer vacation >.<

item.title: Re: Need Sparring Partners
item.content:encoded: why adding spars when ure planning to quit playing bvs ?

item.title: Shadow- Kakashi- and TobiHMF need Sparring Partners
item.content:encoded:
I thought it could be a good idea to have more Sparring Partners before I leave…
These are my chars:
ShadowHMF
KakashiHMF
TobiHMF

Feel free to add them and reply in this thread when you have so I can add you back :)
